Description:
Consult with clients to understand their lash goals and preferences.
Apply individual eyelash extensions with precision and care, adhering to safety and hygiene standards.
Customize lash designs to complement clients' eye shapes and facial features.
Provide exceptional customer service by addressing client questions and concerns.
Maintain a clean and organized work environment, including sterilizing tools and equipment.
Stay updated on the latest lash extension trends and techniques.
Schedule appointments, manage client records, and handle payments.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a lash technician or lash artist.
In-depth knowledge of various eyelash extension techniques, including classic and volume lashes.
Excellent hand-eye coordination and attention to detail.
Strong interpersonal skills to build rapport with clients and create a comfortable atmosphere.
Ability to recommend appropriate lash styles based on clients' features and preferences.
Understanding of lash adhesive properties and proper application techniques.
Commitment to maintaining a clean and sanitary workspace.
Flexibility in working hours to accommodate client appointments.
Certification in lash extensions is a plus.
